description:
Dashboard for Micrometer instrumented Service Manager (Spring Boot)

Filter by datasource/namespace/node.

panels.description: Description of dashboard

options.content:
# Service Manager HTTP Dashboard

Team: SaaS  
Service: Service Manager (Spring Boot)  
Aim: Monitor HTTP request metrics, response times, and server performance to ensure optimal API performance and reliability.

---

## Key Metrics
- HTTP Requests: Total requests, status codes (2xx, 4xx, 5xx), and rates per second.
- Response Times: Average, 95th, and 99th percentile response times.
- Tomcat Metrics: Active threads, idle threads, and connection counts.
- Endpoint-Specific Metrics: Breakdown for /api/v1/service (POST, PATCH, DELETE).

---

## Filters
- Namespace, Application, Pod Name: Narrow down metrics for specific instances.

panels.title: Dashboard Info

panels.description: requests/s
panels.title: Number of HTTP requests per second (all endpoints)

panels.description: seconds
panels.title: 99th && 95th percentile of HTTP response time

panels.title: Max HTTP response time && Average HTTP response time (without /management/.*)
Average HTTP CREATE Rate per Second

targets.legendFormat: Average HTTP CREATE Rate per Second

targets.expr: sum(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{namespace=~"$namespace",app=~"$application", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$podname", status!~"5..",  uri="/api/v1/service", method="POST"}[5m]))/sum(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{namespace=~"$namespace",app=~"$application", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$podname", status!~"5..", uri="/api/v1/service", method="POST"}[5m]))

panels.title: Average HTTP CREATE Rate per Second

targets.legendFormat: Average HTTP PATCH Rate per Second

targets.expr: sum(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{namespace=~"$namespace",app=~"$application", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$podname", status!~"5..", uri=~"/api/v1/service/.*", method="PATCH"}[5m]))/sum(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{namespace=~"$namespace",app=~"$application", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$podname", status!~"5..", uri=~"/api/v1/service/.*", method="PATCH"}[5m]))

panels.title: Average HTTP DELETE Rate per Second

targets.expr: sum(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{namespace=~"$namespace",app=~"$application", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$podname", status!~"5..", uri=~"/api/v1/service/.*", method="DELETE"}[5m]))/sum(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{namespace=~"$namespace",app=~"$application", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$podname", status!~"5..", uri=~"/api/v1/service/.*", method="DELETE"}[5m]))

targets.legendFormat: Average HTTP DELETE Rate per Second

targets.expr: sum(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{namespace=~"$namespace",app=~"$application", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$podname", status!~"5..", uri=~"/api/v1/service/.*", method="DELETE"}[5m]))/sum(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{namespace=~"$namespace",app=~"$application", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$podname", status!~"5..", uri=~"/api/v1/service/.*", method="DELETE"}[5m]))
